text: @FLOTUS @WhiteHouse @POTUS Because of the Coronavirus, 80% of potential foster parents are not accepting children. So Congress is giving incentives. If President Trump hadn’t tried to hide the virus to protect his campaign, we wouldn’t have these problems.
